review.title: “Financial analyst exp 1yr and 6 months”
review.pros: Pros – Good salary for equity research analysts and the working environment is very good.
review.cons: Cons – Growth for the employee on the career is less compared to other companies.

review.title: “More to do”
review.pros: Pros – The work Pressure is tad low which makes employees to wish staying there forever.
review.cons: Cons – Not a best place for career growth
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Must try inculcating new ways to work which might help employees to grow their career!!

review.title: “Great Work Life Balance”
review.pros: Pros – Amazingly chilled out work place with very little work pressure. Frequent parties and outing and good money too. If you are looking to settle down,great place to do it.
review.cons: Cons – Captive, not much growth opportunities. The story is same as any other captive KPOs, work very specific, growth opportunities minimum, with few new avenues to expand to.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
